transcription: Wait a second... Is that a Kool-Aid? If you wanna kill the competition with creativity, you wanna kill your competition. Knock em to the ground. Bring all of your resources and all of your creativity. Give it the time, the energy, the focus that's deserving of being a winner. Check money. Let's get it. Man, I told that nigga Streets, man, you hit the kill switch, I'ma kill shit.  It's like this shit is all I know man. Got the ting with me. Shit we good.  Got time for these rap niggas, these rap niggas is wack If you hear my name up on your track, nigga just know it's a motherfuckin' rap You fuck around and get smacked, then fuck around and get jacked All my niggas say to do, quit the spray, we won't hesitate to get clapped First I took dice and I took angry and I put that shit on my back So how the fuck you think I'm gon' act? Don't think a nigga gon' snap  I  right in front of ya, hibachi grill yeah, so so so them pesos on pay hoes they pay me that boy bad they see me, that vision clear HD, kill switch, kill shit, gon fuck one pull a life sentence kill switch, kill shit, let em go ain't no life in em kick raps, jack chan, don't fuck with y'all I'm one hangman, bankers a game so you hangman my whole damn clique we a bangman, you can get your chain straight debold I can do this with my eyes closed like Jordan at the free throw take a crack at me, that's a sad way to die bro  Chance tryna crack the DaVinci Code  you
